column4: q3: This system is a sempron box with 384 MB RAM and has an S3 trio onboard graphics chipset (VIA). The graphics are generally sluggish. The card appears to have been detected OK, but do I have to enable 3D support or something?
Pardon my ignorance, but I'm new to all this..
OpenGL renderer string: Mesa DRI UniChrome (K8M800) 20060710
